title: Youtube Video and Music downloader input fields
description: Input Youtube Video URL and configure other options

urls.title: Video URLs
urls.description: The URL of the video to download

audioOnly.title: Extract audio only
audioOnly.description: Extract only audio from a video useful if you want only want audio from a video or want to download music

videoQuality.title: Select video quality
videoQuality.description: Select video quality to download, works only if 'audioOnly' option is false

audioQuality.title: Select audio quality
audioQuality.description: Select audio quality to download, works only if 'audioOnly' option is true

videoFormat.title: Select video file type (can be slow) if true
videoFormat.description: Select video file type (.mp4, .mkv, .webm), works only if 'audioOnly' is true

audioFormat.title: Select audio file type (can be slow if true) if true
audioFormat.description: Select audio file type (.mp4, .mkv, .webm) , works only if 'audioOnly' is true

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of parts to download at a time. Higher values increase speed but use more bandwidth. A safe limit is 5-10 to avoid rate limiting

proxy.title: Use proxy
proxy.description: Enable proxy for downloading, only residential proxy would be used as others don't work
